title: Ticket #2859: Prioritize GRAM GAHP Commands
description:
Stress testing of Condor-G and GRAM 5.2 showed a large number of job failures due to the gridmanager not sending GRAM commit signals quickly enough to the GRAM job-manager. We believe this is due to a large back-log of GAHP commands. Making GRAM commit commands high-priority should alleviate the problem.

There may be additional GRAM GAHP commands that should be made high- or low-priority.
